Text: fps is 29.97 --  not 23.976, according  to GOM player

Nice quality, and thanks for keeping the size small.  I usually go for rips only when I or those who watch with me are just marginally interested, and to check quality before buying a good copy, so this was a great way to find out the movie was so-so.

Kool gross out effects, but the predictable tension building was so 20 years ago.
